adrFormatAddress: 311 W 24th St #11B, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Sergey Terushkin is the best! My husband and I both had gastric bypass surgery. The level of service, Professionalism, care, and support we received before our surgery and continue to receive after is nothing short of outstanding. We definitely recommend this center if you're considering weight loss surgery.

text.text: Dr. Sergey Terushkin is the best! My husband and I both had gastric bypass surgery. The level of service, Professionalism, care, and support we received before our surgery and continue to receive after is nothing short of outstanding. We definitely recommend this center if you're considering weight loss surgery.

originalText.text: No one could have asked for a better surgeon. Very professional and very knowledgeable in his profession. We discussed all of my weight loss options.  My bariatric surgery was a great success. Would recommend him to all my family and friends who have tried unsuccessfully to lose weight. Keep up the excellent work you are doing Dr. Sergey Terushkin. Thank you to you and your staff. Your great service will always be appreciated.

text.text: No one could have asked for a better surgeon. Very professional and very knowledgeable in his profession. We discussed all of my weight loss options.  My bariatric surgery was a great success. Would recommend him to all my family and friends who have tried unsuccessfully to lose weight. Keep up the excellent work you are doing Dr. Sergey Terushkin. Thank you to you and your staff. Your great service will always be appreciated.

originalText.text: Dr. Sergey Terushkin is an awesome physician. Knows his stuff and very respected by all that work with him. The hospital staff is highly complementary of him. I had a gastric sleeve surgery performed by him and have lost 100 pounds! His follow up is great as well.

text.text: Dr. Sergey Terushkin is an awesome physician. Knows his stuff and very respected by all that work with him. The hospital staff is highly complementary of him. I had a gastric sleeve surgery performed by him and have lost 100 pounds! His follow up is great as well.

originalText.text: Dr. Terushkin is simply amazing! Very highly recommend him. From the first meeting with him to discuss my weight loss options to every appointment the bariatric surgery, he has been nothing short of professional, knowledgeable, and truly caring. Without a question, the absolute BEST doctor I have ever had.

text.text: Dr. Terushkin is simply amazing! Very highly recommend him. From the first meeting with him to discuss my weight loss options to every appointment the bariatric surgery, he has been nothing short of professional, knowledgeable, and truly caring. Without a question, the absolute BEST doctor I have ever had.

originalText.text: I had the gastric sleeve surgery at this office and have lost over 60 pounds since then. Dr. Terushkin is a wonderful man who does far more than is probably necessary on his part to encourage his patients to better themselves..
